long_description: Maintain the still of the night--this propane lantern offers quiet, flicker-free performance. Double mantle design is fully adjustable from bright to dim. Pressure-regulated for superior performance in all weather conditions. High-impact plastic base keeps lantern stable when set on a table or the ground. Uses 16.4-oz. propane cylinder, sold separately. Convenient bail for carrying. Operate with extreme caution around fabrics or within confined spaces; read and follow all instructions carefully. Due to flammable item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell fuel canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores.
short_description: Maintain the still of the night--this propane lantern offers quiet, flicker-free performance.
